summary: In the future, a kickboxer and a robot lead a revolution against ruling cyborgs.
cast: Kathy Long|Kris Kristofferson|Lance Henriksen|Scott Paulin|Gary Daniels|Nicholas Guest|Vincent Klyn|Ben McCreary|Bob Brown|Jon H. Epstein|Burton Richardson|Nancy Thurston|Edmund Tyler Wrenn|Brad Langenberg|Clare Hoak|Casey Wallace|Blair Valk|Michael Halsey|Tim Thomerson
title: Knights (caballeros)
